short_description: golden apple weddings is an event planner services company based in rhodes, greece.
long_description: golden apple weddings is a wedding planning and event design company, founded by katerina ageliniou & katia stavroulaki, based on rhodes island in greece which provides a full range of planning, coordinating and consulting services. the brand specializes in the details that makes an event truly breathtaking and is dedicated in making each client's vision a reality. from obtaining all the necessary legal documents, booking the ideal location that suits your needs and wishes, choosing and coordinating the appropriate assistants to arranging your transportation and accommodation, we are here to give solutions to all aspects of your wedding. but what makes golden apple weddings stand out from other wedding coordinators in greece. the attention paid on detail. each one of the weddings we create unfolds like a unique fairy tale. your love will give us inspiration to unravel the mystery of your love story in front of you and your guests. from the very first moment of our cooperation we will make you feel safe about each step of the preparation. a detailed planning calendar is always our first topic so to make sure that all necessary arrangements will be completed on time. due to our knowledge of local suppliers and authorities, we are always one step ahead of all circumstances. based on your style and wishes, we will arrange the appropriate location for your wedding ceremony. we undertake the preparation and execution of all legal documentation required for a marriage certificate. presenting you, unique proposals for your wedding reception or party, the options are endless depending on your dreams and budget and we can be adapt to your wishes. our services also include arrangements with the photographer and videographer, floral decorations, beauty treatments, music entertainment, catering, and all other related services. any extra arrangements concerning your accommodation in rhodes island can be easily arranged by us.
business_tags: wedding coordinator | wedding receptions | weddings and ceremonies | planning calendar | marriage certificates | floral decorations | beauty treatments | legal documentation | wedding planning
